a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Time spent on 'other activities', per day, men vs women
Average minutes spent on 'other activities', per day, by sex (ages 15-65). Estimates come from time-use surveys and
include both weekdays and weekends. 'Other activities' are those not considered work (paid or unpaid), study,
leisure, or personal care. The survey years differ across countries. See the source description for the survey year
Minutes spent on other activities - men (15-65)
Minutes spent on other activities - women (15-65)
Note: 'Other activities' include: religious/spiritual activities; civic obligations; other (not under work, study, leisure or personal care)
